name: Jump 2D
description:
This is my first game!

Jump 2D is a free 2D plattformer in this game you need to complete all levels to unlock the last level.

In the future there will also be updates that add more levels.

I would be very happy if you installed the game. And then write me feedback and ideas. Thank you!

You can download the game from the Galaxy Store: Samsung Galaxy Store

You want to give feedback?

Then come on my discord server and write me. Thanks :) Discord
